solution_line_template: He streams for {days_in_week}-{days_off_streaming}=<<{days_in_week}-{days_off_streaming}={streaming_days_per_week}>>{streaming_days_per_week} days a week
So he streams {streaming_days_per_week}*{hours_per_stream_day}=<<{streaming_days_per_week}*{hours_per_stream_day}={total_streaming_hours_per_week}>>{total_streaming_hours_per_week} hours a week
That means he makes {total_streaming_hours_per_week}*{hourly_rate}=$<<{total_streaming_hours_per_week}*{hourly_rate}={weekly_earnings}>>{weekly_earnings} a week
